title: CBDC Skepticism Is Strong in Canada and England, Too
description: Americans aren’t the only ones wary of a central bank digital currency, two recent surveys show.

title: Valve Clarifies Banning Games With AI-Generated Art on Steam
description: Valve, the PC digital distribution platform, has made headlines as it implements a ban on games that incorporate AI-generated art on Steam. This decision comes in response to growing concerns about copyright infringement and the need to protect intellectual property rights. Developers are now required to provide evidence of ownership for AI gaming assets to ... Read more

title: Movie star warns about the challenges and controversies surrounding AI
description: The potential threat posed by artificial intelligence (AI) has long been a prominent theme in science fiction, captivating audiences through Hollywood blockbusters. However, iconic movie star Arnold Schwarzenegger recently emphasized that this threat is no longer confined to the realm of imagination but has become a real concern. title: Double or Nothing: Top Analyst Benjamin Cowen Expects Bitcoin to Double in Price
description: Prominent cryptocurrency analyst Benjamin Cowen makes a bullish Bitcoin price prediction.  The analyst is forecasting a potential upclimb in Bitcoin’s price that could lead to the asset hitting an all-time high in 2023.  As the cryptocurrency market fluctuates in value, market sentiments have continued to sway between the positives and negatives. title: $656,000,000 in Crypto Lost in Hacks, Scams and Rug Pulls In First Half of 2023: Blockchain Security Firm
description:
